title.en: Prayer to the Garland of Rebirths of the Dzogchenpas of Eastern Tibet

text.en: Thedharmatānature is beyond arising and ceasing and past, present and future,
text.en-trans: dü sum kyé gak mépé chönyi kyang

text.en: Yet still you appear in the two formkāyas1within the realms of sentient beings—
text.en-trans: semchen kham la zuk ku nam nyi su

text.en: Marvellous buddha Ratnaśikhī,
text.en-trans: nangwé ngotsar deshek tsuk tor chen

text.en: Whose name alone liberates from the lower realms: to you I pray!
text.en-trans: tsen gyi ngen song drol la solwa dep

text.en: Kukkurīpāda, master of infinite classes of tantra,
text.en-trans: gyü dé gyamtsö ngadak ku ku ri

text.en: Vimalamitra, who achieved the vajra state of great transference,
text.en-trans: pochen dorjé sa nyé bi ma la

text.en: And Saraha, who realized the Great Seal beyond conceptual elaboration,
text.en-trans: trödral chakgya chen po sa ra ha

text.en: To these three fountainheads of the teachings, I pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé chu go sum la solwa dep

text.en: Śrī Siṃha, who bound gods and spirits into servitude,
text.en-trans: lha sin dren khöl lanpa shiri sing

text.en: Könchok Jungné,2who destroyed the delusory appearances of rocks and mountains,
text.en-trans: trul nang drak ri nyilwa könchok jung

text.en: And Tri Ralpachen, who caused the buddha’s teachings to shine like the sun,
text.en-trans: gyal ten nyinmor chepa tri ral zhap

text.en: To these three allies of the teachings, I pray!
text.en-trans: tenpé tsa lak sum la solwa dep

text.en: Paktsangwa,3who attained realization through bringing ignorance onto the path,
text.en-trans: timuk lam lang drup chok paktsang wa

text.en: Changchub Gyalpo,4who became a heart-son of Mila Shyepe Dorje,
text.en-trans: mi la zhépé sé gyur chang chub gyal

text.en: And Düsum Khyenpa,5illusory manifestation of Senge, the sixth guide,
text.en-trans: drukpa sengé gyutrul düsum khyen

text.en: To these three supremely accomplished ones, I pray!
text.en-trans: drubpa chok nyé sum la solwa dep

text.en: Lingjé Répa,6who freed his mind through realization,
text.en-trans: tokpé dak gyü drolwa ling ré jé

text.en: Taklung Thangpa,7who perfected devotion for the guru,
text.en-trans: lamar mögü tarchin taklung wa

text.en: And Orgyen Rangjungpa,8who mastered yogic discipline:
text.en-trans: tulzhuk drubpa orgyen rangjung wa

text.en: To these three holders of the teachings from the practice lineage, I pray!
text.en-trans: drubgyü tendzin sum la solwa dep

text.en: Stable in the three foundational practices and with excellent intellect,
text.en-trans: zhi sum tsawa tenpa lodrö zang

text.en: You perfected the force of aspirations to spread the Nyingma teachings in Kham,
text.en-trans: nying ten do mé pel la mönlam gyi

text.en: Pema Rigdzin,9holder of awareness in Padma’s line,
text.en-trans: tu drup pemé rigpa dzinpa dang

text.en: And Gyurme Thekchok Tendzin Pal Zangpo,10to you I pray!
text.en-trans: gyurmé tekchok ché la solwa dep

text.en: And Ngedön Tendzin Zangpo,11who established traditions
text.en-trans: ngagyur tenpé tsawa do gyu sem

text.en: Of great accomplishment-practices for the Kama traditions,
text.en-trans: yang pur sangyé nyampar jor la sok

text.en: Such as the fundamental teachings of the Early Translations: the Sūtra, Illusory Web and Mind,12
text.en-trans: kamé drupchen trinlé söl töpé

text.en: And Yangphur (Viśuddha and Vajrakīlaya) and Sangye Nyamjor—to you, I pray!
text.en-trans: ngédön tendzin zangpor solwa dep

text.en: Inspire us with your blessings, so that we may prepare our minds with renunciation,
text.en-trans: ngé jung gyü len chang chub sem nyi kyi

text.en: And then, drawn along on the chariot of twofold bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: shingté dranpé min drol lam chok la

text.en: Realize, in this very lifetime, all the accomplishments born of stable familiarity
text.en-trans: taktu tengom gyipé ngödrup kun

text.en: With the supreme path of ripening and liberation!
text.en-trans: tsé di nyi la tongwar chin gyi lop
